name: Joseph Cowin
title: DevSecOps Engineer
summary: DevSecOps Engineer with 7+ years of experience operating production systems at scale. Strong in incident response, Root Cause Analysis (RCA), and Service Level Agreement (SLA) management, with hands-on experience in Kubernetes (AKS), Terraform, and Azure DevOps & GitHub Actions CI/CD. Comfortable troubleshooting across APIs, containers, and event streaming (Confluent Kafka). Recent focus on Azure governance-as-code (Enterprise Policy-as-Code, EPAC), Wiz (CSPM/CNAPP), and posture visibility/remediation.
selectedAchievements: Delivered a DevSecOps framework for an event-driven AI Player Promotions tool on AKS, enabling 60+ deployments/day at peak while sustaining 1,000+ events/sec.
Raised Azure Policy compliance by 5% across 600+ subscriptions via EPAC with pull request gates and pipelines; improved auditability and policy drift detection.
Cut lead time to on-premises production from weeks to days by automating Azure DevOps YAML pipelines with approvals and reusable templates; reduced change failure rate.
